name: Speed Stitch
description:
Race against the clock to sew swatches of fabric together!

Build up your multiplier by sewing without mistakes!

Disclaimer: There's no actual rhythm involved but Itch doesn't have a good genre tag that fits this game.

How To Play:

  • Tap A when hole is on the left
  • Tap S when hole is on the right
  • For double holes, hold the key for the side the needle is on then tap the key for the opposite side

**Your highscore will only save when timer runs out, restarting during a run wont save your score

Sound effects created with ZZFX and music with ZZFXM.
